name: Uchuu Senkan Yamato: Ankoku Seidan Teikoku no Gyakushuu
name_original: Uchuu Senkan Yamato: Ankoku Seidan Teikoku no Gyakushuu
description: Uchuu Senkan Yamato: Ankoku Seidan Teikoku no Gyakushuu (宇宙戦艦ヤマト　暗黒星団帝国の逆襲) is a Action video game published by Bandai released on January 27th, 2005 for the PlayStation 2.
